verses.verse: כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> For הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> behold הָאָד֜וֹן <S%H113><s%> For behold the Lord יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֗וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts מֵסִ֤יר <S%H5493><s%> doth take away מִירוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> from Jerusalem וּמִ֣יהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> and from Judah מַשְׁעֵ֖ן <S%H4937><s%> the stay וּמַשְׁעֵנָ֑ה <S%H4938><s%> and the staff כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> and the whole מִשְׁעַן־ <S%H4937><s%> the whole stay לֶ֔חֶם <S%H3899><s%> of bread וְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> and the whole מִשְׁעַן־ <S%H4937><s%> stay מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> of water

גִּבּ֖וֹר <S%H1368><s%> The mighty man וְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and the man מִלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> of war שׁוֹפֵ֥ט <S%H8199><s%> the judge וְנָבִ֖יא <S%H5030><s%> and the prophet וְקֹסֵ֥ם <S%H7080><s%> and the prudent וְזָקֵֽן׃ <S%H2205><s%> and the ancient

שַׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> The captain חֲמִשִּׁ֖ים <S%H2572><s%> of fifty וּנְשׂ֣וּא <S%H5375><s%> and the honourable פָנִ֑ים <S%H6440><s%> man וְיוֹעֵ֛ץ <S%H3289><s%> and the counsellor וַחֲכַ֥ם <S%H2450><s%> and the cunning חֲרָשִׁ֖ים <S%H2798><s%> Charashim וּנְב֥וֹן <S%H995><s%> and the eloquent לָֽחַשׁ׃ <S%H3908><s%> orator

וְנָתַתִּ֥י <S%H5414><s%> And I will give נְעָרִ֖ים <S%H5288><s%> children שָׂרֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H8269><s%> [to be] their princes וְתַעֲלוּלִ֖ים <S%H8586><s%> and babes יִמְשְׁלוּ־ <S%H4910><s%> shall rule בָֽם׃

וְנִגַּ֣שׂ <S%H5065><s%> shall be oppressed הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> And the people אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one בְּאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> by another וְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and every one בְּרֵעֵ֑הוּ <S%H7453><s%> by his neighbour יִרְהֲב֗וּ <S%H7292><s%> shall behave himself proudly הַנַּ֙עַר֙ <S%H5288><s%> the child בַּזָּקֵ֔ן <S%H2205><s%> against the ancient וְהַנִּקְלֶ֖ה <S%H7034><s%> and the base בַּנִּכְבָּֽד׃ <S%H3513><s%> against the honourable

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When יִתְפֹּ֨שׂ <S%H8610><s%> shall take hold אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> When a man בְּאָחִיו֙ <S%H251><s%> of his brother בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house אָבִ֔יו <S%H1><s%> of his father שִׂמְלָ֣ה <S%H8071><s%> [saying] Thou hast clothing לְכָ֔ה <S%H1980><s%> you קָצִ֖ין <S%H7101><s%> be thou our ruler תִּֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become לָּ֑נוּ וְהַמַּכְשֵׁלָ֥ה <S%H4384><s%> and [let] this ruin הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> likewise תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> will be under יָדֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3027><s%> [be] under thy hand

יִשָּׂא֩ <S%H5375><s%> shall he swear בַיּ֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In that day הַה֤וּא ׀ <S%H1931><s%> he לֵאמֹר֙ <S%H559><s%> saying לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אֶהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become חֹבֵ֔שׁ <S%H2280><s%> I will not be an healer וּבְבֵיתִ֕י <S%H1004><s%> for in my house אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> there לֶ֖חֶם <S%H3899><s%> [is] neither bread וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> is neither שִׂמְלָ֑ה <S%H8071><s%> nor clothing לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> should not תְשִׂימֻ֖נִי <S%H7760><s%> make קְצִ֥ין <S%H7101><s%> me not a ruler עָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> of the people

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> Because כָשְׁלָה֙ <S%H3782><s%> is ruined יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> For Jerusalem וִיהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> and Judah נָפָ֑ל <S%H5307><s%> is fallen כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because לְשׁוֹנָ֤ם <S%H3956><s%> because their tongue וּמַֽעַלְלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H4611><s%> and their doings אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> are against יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> [are] against the LORD לַמְר֖וֹת <S%H4784><s%> to provoke עֵנֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> the eyes כְבוֹדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3519><s%> of his glory

הַכָּרַ֤ת <S%H1971><s%> The shew פְּנֵיהֶם֙ <S%H6440><s%> of their countenance עָ֣נְתָה <S%H6030><s%> doth witness against them בָּ֔ם וְחַטָּאתָ֛ם <S%H2403><s%> their sin כִּסְדֹ֥ם <S%H5467><s%> as Sodom הִגִּ֖ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> and they declare לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> do כִחֵ֑דוּ <S%H3582><s%> they hide א֣וֹי <S%H188><s%> [it] not Woe לְנַפְשָׁ֔ם <S%H5315><s%> unto their soul כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for גָמְל֥וּ <S%H1580><s%> for they have rewarded לָהֶ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> like רָעָֽה׃ <S%H7451><s%> evil

אִמְר֥וּ <S%H559><s%> Say צַדִּ֖יק <S%H6662><s%> ye to the righteous כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> that ט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> that [it shall be] well כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for פְרִ֥י <S%H6529><s%> the fruit מַעַלְלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H4611><s%> of their doings יֹאכֵֽלוּ׃ <S%H398><s%> [with him] for they shall eat

א֖וֹי <S%H188><s%> Woe לְרָשָׁ֣ע <S%H7563><s%> unto the wicked רָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> [it shall be] ill כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for גְמ֥וּל <S%H1576><s%> [with him] for the reward יָדָ֖יו <S%H3027><s%> of his hands יֵעָ֥שֶׂה <S%H6213><s%> shall be given לּֽוֹ׃

עַמִּי֙ <S%H5971><s%> [As for] my people נֹגְשָׂ֣יו <S%H5065><s%> [are] their oppressors מְעוֹלֵ֔ל <S%H5768><s%> babe וְנָשִׁ֖ים <S%H802><s%> and women מָ֣שְׁלוּ <S%H4910><s%> rule ב֑וֹ עַמִּי֙ <S%H5971><s%> over them O my people מְאַשְּׁרֶ֣יךָ <S%H833><s%> they which lead מַתְעִ֔ים <S%H8582><s%> thee cause [thee] to err וְדֶ֥רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> the way אֹֽרְחֹתֶ֖יךָ <S%H734><s%> of thy paths בִּלֵּֽעוּ׃ <S%H1104><s%> and destroy ס
נִצָּ֥ב <S%H5324><s%> standeth up לָרִ֖יב <S%H7378><s%> to plead יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD וְעֹמֵ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> and standeth לָדִ֥ין <S%H1777><s%> to judge עַמִּֽים׃ <S%H5971><s%> the people

יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD בְּמִשְׁפָּ֣ט <S%H4941><s%> into judgment יָב֔וֹא <S%H935><s%> will enter עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with זִקְנֵ֥י <S%H2205><s%> with the ancients עַמּ֖וֹ <S%H5971><s%> of his people וְשָׂרָ֑יו <S%H8269><s%> and the princes וְאַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> who בִּֽעַרְתֶּ֣ם <S%H1197><s%> thereof for ye have eaten up הַכֶּ֔רֶם <S%H3754><s%> the vineyard גְּזֵלַ֥ת <S%H1500><s%> the spoil הֶֽעָנִ֖י <S%H6041><s%> of the poor בְּבָתֵּיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1004><s%> [is] in your houses

[מַלָּכֶם כ] (מַה־ לָּכֶם֙ <S%H4480><s%> at ק) תְּדַכְּא֣וּ <S%H1792><s%> to pieces עַמִּ֔י <S%H5971><s%> my people וּפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> the faces עֲנִיִּ֖ים <S%H6041><s%> afflicted תִּטְחָ֑נוּ <S%H2912><s%> and grind נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> said אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> God יַ֚עַן <S%H3282><s%> Because כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for גָֽבְהוּ֙ <S%H1361><s%> are haughty בְּנ֣וֹת <S%H1323><s%> the daughters צִיּ֔וֹן <S%H6726><s%> of Zion וַתֵּלַ֙כְנָה֙ <S%H1980><s%> walking [נְטוֹּות כ] (נְטוּיֹ֣ות <S%H5186><s%> afternoon ק) גָּר֔וֹן <S%H1627><s%> necks וּֽמְשַׂקְּר֖וֹת <S%H8265><s%> and wanton עֵינָ֑יִם <S%H5869><s%> eyes הָל֤וֹךְ <S%H1980><s%> and go וְטָפֹף֙ <S%H2952><s%> and mincing תֵּלַ֔כְנָה <S%H1980><s%> and walk וּבְרַגְלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H7272><s%> with their feet תְּעַכַּֽסְנָה׃ <S%H5913><s%> and making a tinkling

וְשִׂפַּ֣ח <S%H5596><s%> will smite with a scab אֲדֹנָ֔י <S%H136><s%> Therefore the Lord קָדְקֹ֖ד <S%H6936><s%> the crown of the head בְּנ֣וֹת <S%H1323><s%> of the daughters צִיּ֑וֹן <S%H6726><s%> of Zion וַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD פָּתְהֵ֥ן <S%H6596><s%> their secret parts יְעָרֶֽה׃ <S%H6168><s%> will discover ס

בַּיּ֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In that day הַה֜וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יָסִ֣יר <S%H5493><s%> will take away אֲדֹנָ֗י <S%H136><s%> the Lord אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> תִּפְאֶ֧רֶת <S%H8597><s%> the bravery הָעֲכָסִ֛ים <S%H5914><s%> of [their] tinkling ornaments וְהַשְּׁבִיסִ֖ים <S%H7636><s%> [about their feet] and [their] cauls וְהַשַּׂהֲרֹנִֽים׃ <S%H7720><s%> and [their] round tires like the moon
הַנְּטִיפ֥וֹת <S%H5188><s%> The chains וְהַשֵּׁיר֖וֹת <S%H8285><s%> and the bracelets וְהָֽרְעָלֽוֹת׃ <S%H7479><s%> and the mufflers

הַפְּאֵרִ֤ים <S%H6287><s%> The bonnets וְהַצְּעָדוֹת֙ <S%H6807><s%> and the ornaments of the legs וְהַקִּשֻּׁרִ֔ים <S%H7196><s%> and the headbands וּבָתֵּ֥י <S%H1004><s%> boxes הַנֶּ֖פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> any וְהַלְּחָשִֽׁים׃ <S%H3908><s%> and the earrings
הַטַּבָּע֖וֹת <S%H2885><s%> The rings וְנִזְמֵ֥י <S%H5141><s%> jewels הָאָֽף׃ <S%H639><s%> and nose

הַמַּֽחֲלָצוֹת֙ <S%H4254><s%> The changeable suits of apparel וְהַמַּ֣עֲטָפ֔וֹת <S%H4595><s%> and the mantles וְהַמִּטְפָּח֖וֹת <S%H4304><s%> and the wimples וְהָחֲרִיטִֽים׃ <S%H2754><s%> and the crisping pins
וְהַגִּלְיֹנִים֙ <S%H1549><s%> The glasses וְהַסְּדִינִ֔ים <S%H5466><s%> and the fine linen וְהַצְּנִיפ֖וֹת <S%H6797><s%> and the hoods וְהָרְדִידִֽים׃ <S%H7289><s%> and the vails

וְהָיָה֩ <S%H1961><s%> will come תַ֨חַת <S%H8478><s%> instead בֹּ֜שֶׂם <S%H1314><s%> And it shall come to pass [that] instead of sweet smell מַ֣ק <S%H4716><s%> there shall be stink יִֽהְיֶ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> will come וְתַ֨חַת <S%H8478><s%> Instead חֲגוֹרָ֤ה <S%H2290><s%> and instead of a girdle נִקְפָּה֙ <S%H5364><s%> a rent וְתַ֨חַת <S%H8478><s%> Instead מַעֲשֶׂ֤ה <S%H4639><s%> and instead of well set מִקְשֶׁה֙ <S%H4748><s%> hair קָרְחָ֔ה <S%H7144><s%> baldness וְתַ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> Instead פְּתִיגִ֖יל <S%H6614><s%> and instead of a stomacher מַחֲגֹ֣רֶת <S%H4228><s%> a girding שָׂ֑ק <S%H8242><s%> of sackcloth כִּי־ <S%H3587><s%> [and] burning תַ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> instead יֹֽפִי׃ <S%H3308><s%> instead of beauty
מְתַ֖יִךְ <S%H4962><s%> Thy men בַּחֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> by the sword יִפֹּ֑לוּ <S%H5307><s%> shall fall וּגְבוּרָתֵ֖ךְ <S%H1369><s%> and thy mighty בַּמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> in the war

וְאָנ֥וּ <S%H578><s%> shall lament וְאָבְל֖וּ <S%H56><s%> and mourn פְּתָחֶ֑יהָ <S%H6607><s%> And her gates וְנִקָּ֖תָה <S%H5352><s%> and she [being] desolate לָאָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon the ground תֵּשֵֽׁב׃ <S%H3427><s%> shall sit
